title: 1.16.1经常崩溃
author: 闪电minecraft
txt_content:
前几天换了个电脑，于是重新下载了MinecraftHMCL启动器，版本1.16.1，经常崩溃，求大佬帮忙
崩溃报告(crash-reports):

---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // Would you like a cupcake?  Time: 20-7-1 下午6:21 Description: Exception in server tick loop  java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread         at java.lang.Thread.start0(Native Method)         at java.lang.Thread.start(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.createWorker(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.tryAddWorker(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.signalWork(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.externalPush(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool.execute(Unknown Source)         at amq.f(SourceFile:122)         at amq.a(SourceFile:115)         at zg.A_(SourceFile:154)         at zb$a.x(SourceFile:553)         at zb.d(SourceFile:280)         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.aZ(SourceFile:751)         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.x(SourceFile:739)         at amn.bj(SourceFile:103)         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.w(SourceFile:723)         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.v(SourceFile:676)         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.a(SourceFile:256)         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)   A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  -- System Details -- Details:         Minecraft Version: 1.16.1         Minecraft Version ID: 1.16.1         Operating System: Windows 10 (x86) version 10.0         Java Version: 1.8.0_251, Oracle Corporation         Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation         Memory: 567478776 bytes (541 MB) / 1073741824 bytes (1024 MB) up to 1073741824 bytes (1024 MB)         CPUs: 8         JVM Flags: 12 total; -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20 -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=50 -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=16M -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xss1M -Xmx1024m -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump         Player Count: 1 / 8; [ze['LightningMC233'/304, l='ServerLevel[新的世界]', x=-95.84, y=68.00, z=-34.28]]         Data Packs: vanilla         Type: Integrated Server (map_client.txt)         Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and both client + server brands are untouched.

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
卸载你之前安装的所有java 
装这个
https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

你用的是32位的java 最多分配1G内存
然后你的游戏因为内存不够崩溃了

replies.author: Sssss...
replies.txt_content:
内存溢出了

启动器里多分配一点就好

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread  
系统内存足够么？
关掉其他软件运行试试
也可以试试增大或者减小分配内存 毕竟native我也不知道




java能换64位就换64

replies.author: 闪电minecraft
replies.txt_content:
Sssss... 发表于 2020-7-1 18:29
内存溢出了

启动器里多分配一点就好
我内存足够，不是这个问题吧

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
闪电minecraft 发表于 2020-7-1 18:30
我内存足够，不是这个问题吧
说了是java的问题
看我的回答

replies.author: 闪电minecraft
replies.txt_content:

卸载你之前安装的所有java 
装这个
https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe
我是64位系统，应该是这个问题

replies.author: ancgj
replies.txt_content: 卸载之前的Java再下载一个64位的，你这个应该是32的

replies.author: 闪电minecraft
replies.txt_content:
ancgj 发表于 2020-7-18 09:34
卸载之前的Java再下载一个64位的，你这个应该是32的
早就有人回答了啊，我的JAVA早升级了，无需多言
